Room.Name: Mountain Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking around a very large mountain in the Nellan Mountain Range.
Room.LongDescription: As you round the northern side of the mountain, you can see down into the Ituk Glacier. The glacier is particularly dangerous because one can easily become quite lost in such a place. Scavenging animals are always on the prowl for stranded and helpless prey. The most dangerous of these animals is the white dragon, which is quite common up here.
